title: Leania.ai
description:
Leania.ai – Like an MRI scanner for your business. Diagnose inefficiencies. Recommend AI. Get Personalised AI Recommendations

* Identify inefficiencies - Reduce Costs 
* Streamline Workflows - Save Time & Boost Productivity
* Get Personalised AI Recommendations - Outpace Competitors

Your business changes. So does AI. 
Leania.ai continuously scans your business processes, your tech stack, and the AI market so that you can run leaner every day.
